price: 70. Usuk isi abbaa kee isi marak taqbudeenim maatiyaay iyye waqdi?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
